[COLOR white][B]Iteleflix Esp[/B][/COLOR] $doregex[makelist] https://iteleflix.com/archivos/logo-iteleflix.png https://i.imgur.com/BuL1hDr.jpeg
makelist
<title>[B][COLOR white][makelist.param2][/COLOR][/B]</title> <link>$doregex[play]</link> <thumbnail>[makelist.param3]</thumbnail> <fanart>https://i.imgur.com/BuL1hDr.jpeg</fanart>
(?s)ifield"><a href="(.+?)".+?alt="(.+?)".+?cvpsrc="(.+?)" https://iteleflix.com/
play (?s)loadSource\('(.*?)' [makelist.param1] Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; U; CPU iPhone OS 4_2_1 like Mac OS X; en-us) AppleWebKit/533.17.9 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.0.2 Mobile/8C148 Safari/6533.18.5 https://iteleflix.com
